Overview

StellTec uses a compound of frameworks and methodologies to create its applications. Some of these are:

  • BEM
  • ITCSS
  • SASS

BEM

BEM (Block, Element, Modifier) it's an interesting way to write your class names in combination with working with SASS.

ITCSS

ITCSS is a methodology to organizing your CSS in a lean and scalable way. ITCSS stands for Inverted Triangle CSS and it was created by Harry Roberts.

In essence you structure your CSS in the following manner:

  1. Settings
  2. Tools
  3. Generic
  4. Elements
  5. Objects
  6. Components
  7. Trumps

SASS

We'vs chosen SASS as our way to preprocess our CSS. The reason behind it is because the community behind it and the large amount of people and teams using it.
